definition: to push aside with the hand, foot, a stick etc/to dial/to allocate/to set aside (money)/to poke (the fire)/to pluck (a string instrument)/to turn round/classifier: group, batch
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Prepay and Post Pay option for each dial plan.
sentences.chinese: 预付款和后付款选项为每个拨号计划。

sentences.english: Panicked, Laura dashed into the house, grabbed the phone and dialed the emergency number.
sentences.chinese: 劳娜惊慌地冲进屋里，抓起电话，拨号报警。
样本的选取采取随机数字拨号的方法。
白色颜色真正珐琅拨号盘。

sentences.english: One-chip telephone IC with speech, dialler and ringer functions.
sentences.chinese: 单芯片的讲话，拨号和振铃功能的电话IC。

sentences.english: I can't get a dial tone.
Automatic redial can save a lot of time for you.
sentences.chinese: 自动重拨可以省下很多拨号的时间。

sentences.english: This is especially true if you're still dealing with dial-up .
sentences.chinese: 这一点尤其如此，如果你还在处理拨号上网。

sentences.english: Did you hear a dial tone?
We're losing the dial tone, too.
sentences.chinese: 我们也快听不到电话的拨号音了。

sentences.english: The Repeat Dialer can make about 500 calls per hour.
sentences.chinese: 重复拨号器可以使约500名要求每小时。

sentences.english: For users on dial-up, the 1MB limit still applies.
sentences.chinese: 对于拨号上网的用户，1MB的上限仍然管用。

sentences.english: Please dial the police station at once.
sentences.chinese: 请将电话机清理一下，包括拨号盘。

sentences.english: The pause function can be stored in memory.
sentences.chinese: 执行的暂停功能正常拨号，重拨，或记忆拨号。

sentences.english: The pause function can be stored in memory.
sentences.chinese: 执行的暂停功能正常拨号，重拨，或记忆拨号。
